<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Splendid Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1208) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Animal Trainer
](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=38)

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Trained Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1203)

</column>

---

Your animal companion continues to develop. It becomes a [nimble](/Rules.aspx?ID=156) or [savage](/Rules.aspx?ID=157) animal companion (your choice), gaining abilities determined by its type. Increase its proficiency rank in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) to master instead of [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) or [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1).

<title level="2">Splendid Companion leads to...</title>
[Specialized Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1209)
name: Splendid Companion
